descricaoLivreEN: Terrestrial herb, 30-110 cm tall. Roots 15-20 cm long. Leaves 1-2, oval-lanceolate to elliptic-lanceolate, trinervate, bright green on the adaxial face, green-purple on abaxial face, acute, base attenuate, 8-20 × 4-8 cm; pseudopetiole light green with reddish stains, canaliculate, glabrous, 9-30 cm long. Inflorescence 3-12-florous; peduncle green-reddish, glabrous, covered with lanceolate, glabrous, acuminate, 2-8 cm long bracts; rachis 15-35 cm long, floral bracts pale green, linear-lanceolate, erect or erect-patent, glabrous, awned-acuminate, 15-25 × 3-5 mm. Flowers white-greenish, erect-patent, glabrous, pedicel + ovary 1.5-2 cm long; sepals linear-lanceolate, slightly concave, aristate, long-acuminate, dorsal sepal 21-35 × 4-10 mm, lateral sepals more or less patent, 30-55 x 1.5-4 mm; calcar cylindrical, linear-clavate, 15-25 × 1,5-2 mm; petals linear to lanceolate, falcate, acute or acuminate, 19-25 × 3-4 mm; labellum white, lanceolate, trilobed, membranaceous, unguiculate, 25-35 × 4-7 mm, claw ca. 5 mm long., median lobe linear-triangular, acute to acuminate, margin long-fimbriate, ca. 4 × 2 mm; column semierect, 8-10 mm long. Capsule elliptic-oblongoid, 18-25 mm long.

descricaoLivrePT: Erva terrícola, 30-110 cm alt. Raízes 15-20 cm compr. Folhas 1-2, oval-lanceoladas a elíptico-lanceoladas, trinervadas, verde-brilhante na face adaxial, verde-púrpura na face abaxial, agudas, base atenuada, 8-20 × 4-8 cm; pseudopecíolo verde-claro com máculas avermelhadas, canaliculado, glabro, 9-30 cm compr. Inflorescência 3-12-flora; pedúnculo verde-avermelhado, glabro, coberto por brácteas lanceoladas, glabras, acuminadas, 2-8 cm compr.; raque 15-35 cm compr., brácteas florais verde-pálidas, linear-lanceoladas, eretas ou ereto-patentes, glabras, aristado-acuminadas, 15-25 × 3-5 mm. Flores alvo-esverdeadas, ereto-patentes, glabras, pedicelo + ovário 1,5-2 cm compr.; sépalas linear-lanceoladas, levemente côncavas, aristadas, longamente acuminadas, a dorsal 21-35 × 4-10 mm, as laterais mais ou menos patentes, 30-55 × 1,5-4 mm; calcar cilíndrico, linear-clavado, 15-25 × 1,5-2 mm; pétalas lineares a lanceoladas, falcadas, agudas ou acuminadas, 19-25 × 3-4 mm; labelo branco, lanceolado, trilobado, membranáceo, unguiculado, 25-35 × 4-7 mm, unguículo ca. 5 mm compr., lobo mediano linear-triangular, agudo a acuminado, margem longamente fimbriada, ca. 4 × 2 mm; coluna semi-ereta, 8-10 mm compr. Cápsula elíptico-oblongoide, 18-25 mm compr.
descricaoCamposControlados: Leaf: rosetted yes; petiolate yes. Inflorescence: multiflorous yes; pubescent yes. Flower: petal falcate yes.
